name: Racoon break the wall
description:
Racoon stole a painting from that Big Greedy Hand! Let's run away and figure out what he needs it for!

CONTROLS

  • Press F to pick the painting
  • Press W and S to move Up and Down
  • !PRESS "Back to game" IN DIALOG MENU reading all the dialogs

It might look simple but it's pretty hard to beat so gool luck ;)
